mapper.select:
select
,
from submit_info where subm_id in
#{item}

insert into submit_info (user_id, exam_id, exam_paper_id, exam_param_id, paper_problem_id, problem_id, judger_id, ip, is_teacher_test, status, used_time, used_memory, create_time, modify_time, modify_user_id, source, err_msg) values
(#{item.userId}, #{item.examId}, #{item.examPaperId}, #{item.examParamId}, #{item.paperProblemId}, #{item.problemId}, #{item.judgerId}, #{item.ip}, #{item.isTeacherTest}, #{item.status}, #{item.usedTime}, #{item.usedMemory}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.modifyUserId}, #{item.source}, #{item.errMsg})
